data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Jan Mayen. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Jan Mayen to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Jan Mayen to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 193 believers in Jan Mayen against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, the the state of Jan Mayen will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.focus_label: Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen
data.section_summary:
the state of Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen has a population of 2,900.

We estimate Jan Mayen has 193 people who might know Jesus, 2,444 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 264 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Jan Mayen
location.full_name: Jan Mayen, Svalbard and Jan Mayen
